description: Learned when a Pokémon reaches a certain level.
name: Level up

description: Erscheint bei einem frisch geschlüpften Pokémon
name: Ei

description: Kann jederzeit von einem NPC erlernt werden.
name: Tutor

description: Can be taught at any time by an NPC.
name: Tutor

description: Kann jederzeit durch das benutzen eines TM oder VM erlernt werden.
name: Maschine

description: Can be taught at any time by using a TM or HM.
name: Machine

description: Learned when a non-rental Pikachu helps beat Prime Cup Master Ball R-2. It must participate in every battle
name: Stadium: Surfing Pikachu

description: Erscheint bei einem Pichu dessen Mutter einen Kugelblitz trug. Der Vater darf nicht Ditto sein.
name: Volttackle Pichu

description: Appears on a Pichu whose mother was holding a Light Ball. The father cannot be Ditto.
name: Volt Tackle Pichu

description: Appears on a Shadow Pokémon as it becomes increasingly purified.
name: Colosseum: Purification

description: Appears on a Snatched Shadow Pokémon.
name: XD: Shadow

description: Appears on a Shadow Pokémon as it becomes increasingly purified.
name: XD: Purification

description: Appears when Rotom changes to this form. Disappears if Rotom becomes another form and this move can only be learned by form change.
name: Rotom Form
